[Home](../) &gt; [@lattice/signals](./) &gt; EffectOptions

## EffectOptions type

Options for customizing Effect behavior.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type EffectOptions = {
    instrument?: (impl: (fn: () => void | (() => void)) => () => void, instrumentation: InstrumentationContext, context: ServiceContext) => (fn: () => void | (() => void)) => () => void;
};
```
**References:** [InstrumentationContext](../lattice/instrumentationcontext/)<!-- -->, [ServiceContext](../lattice/servicecontext/)

## Example

Adding instrumentation

```ts
const effectService = Effect({
  instrument(impl, instr, ctx) {
    return (fn) => {
      const dispose = impl(fn);
      instr.emit({ type: 'effect:create', timestamp: Date.now(), data: {} });
      return dispose;
    };
  },
});
```
